resources.string: Point your camera at an object
Keep camera still for a moment
Tap on a dot to inspect
An issue\'s occurred while detecting objects. You may turn off Objects mode or contactus.
This could be: -Herb code: %1$s. -Latin name: %2$s. -Vietnamese name: %3$s.
No result found in object detection mode. You may turn off objects mode to switch to Whole Image mode!
No result found. You may turn off Whole Image mode!
Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us!
Failed to load file! Please try again or try another image!
Failed to recognise this image. You may turn off Whole Image mode or try another image.
Failed to load local data store
Failed to label 1 or some of your images.

Med Herb Lens is a non-profit project that utilises Artificial Intelligence (Deep Learning - Tensorflow) to assist medicinal herbalists and traditional healers and physicians in automatically recognizing and classifying medicinal plants. 

This project was initiated and has been led by Mr. Minh Le, a Doctor of Traditional Medicine student from Thanh Dong University, Vietnam. He helped build the dataset and also assisted in evaluating the authenticity of the input data. 

In consultation with Mr Le, this Android app has been developed by Mr Trien Tran as part of his Master of Information Technology degree's capstone thesis project. He is now an alumnus of St. Paul University Philippines. If you are an iOS developer and willing to join us voluntarily, please reach out via the contact button. 

As of now, the developed AI model can recognise only 70 herbal plants due to limited input data (to view the list of these 70 ones, please press the button at the end of this dialog). Therefore, we look forward to expanding the number of recognised medicinal plants to almost 4000. This ambition will not be achieved without your support. There are 2 ways you may help us out: 

- Please contribute to the dataset by capturing your own herb images using your own mobile and camera devices, then upload them all to our server using this mobile app. 

The image quality does not matter, meaning that it is OK to set the lowest image resolutions for your camera. You may take photos in both portrait and horizontal modes, in different environments with different brightness (night vs day, indoor vs outdoorâ€¦). 

We need details such as fruits, blossoms, branches, leaves, roots, and whole plant, both fresh and sun-dried ones, if possible. 

- And can you please also help us fill in all the herbs' details such as usage, side effects, drug interactions etc.? To do this, please browse or search using our search bar to look for the herbs that you are familiar with or have information about. Then you can click on the edit buttons to modify those details at your own convenience. You can also find the full list herbal plants that already exist in our database by clicking the Full Herb List button below.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
Your herb list will be loaded soon once available.
There are no photos for this herb yet. Please click here to upload them now.

This app does not support capturing photos yet. Please use a camera app to take photos. The image quality does not matter when it comes to regular smartphones and cameras, meaning that it is OK to set the lowest image resolutions for your devices' cameras, to save storage. However, we don't recommend photos taken in an artistic or selfie mode. 

It is your choice to take the photos in either portrait or horizontal mode or both, in different environments at different angles or corners with different brightness (night vs day, indoor vs outdoorâ€¦). The more the better though ^_^. 

We need details such as fruits, blossoms, branches, leaves, roots and whole plant, both fresh and sun-dried ones, if possible because diversity does matter ^_^. Generally, at least 50 images for each part of the plant should suffice for our AI model to learn. We limit the maximum of photo intakes to 1000 per herb. 

The rule of thumbs is, if you have taken a photo of a known herb but you are unable to say the name of the plant in that photo, our AI model should not be either ^_^.
All your images have been uploaded successfully.
Upload in progress. We will notify you once completed.
Uploaded by: %s. \nYou may open this image in a web browser and download it by clicking on it.
Please let us know why you want to delete this image. Your request will be sent to admin for approval.
Your deletion request has been sent to admin for approval.
Please hit OK to open our Google Sheet database where you can add a new herb at the end of the herb list. We will then add it to our database. Thank you!
